Resolution supporting California State Assembly Bill No. 2088, the Wealth Tax, authored by Assembly Member Rob Bonta, and co-authored by Assembly Members Wendy Carrillo, David Chiu, Lorena Gonzalez, Ash Kalra, Miguel Santiago, Mark Stone, Phil Ting, and Buffy Wicks, to impose an annual tax at a rate of 0.4% of a California resident’s net worth in excess of $30,000,000, or in excess of $15,000,000 in the case of a married taxpayer filing separately.
